text: The 1904 California Golden Bears football team was an American football team that represented the University of California, Berkeley during the 1904 college football season. The team competed as an independent under head coach James Hopper and compiled a record of 6–1–1. This marked the team's inaugural season at California Field. ==Schedule== ==References== California Category:California Golden Bears football seasons California Football
title: 1904 California Golden Bears football team
